name: Metamorphosis (itch) (The Viridian)
description:
METAMORPHOSIS is a 2D Platfromer where you have to change the forms of main character to get through the obstacles. Each form of  the character has a unique abilities, so you have to decide which of them you can use to get out of rooms of a lab.

That's the first version of our game. Soon we're going to continue developing this game.
